resources.string: INIXINDO was established on 15th July 1991, at the same time, there was the increase of Open Systems popularity. INIXINDO was established through the visions of Ifik Arifin, a graduate of Computer Science from University of Kaiserslautern, Germany, who predicted that the IT market will be dominated by Open Systems and the Internet. INIXINDO was established with the resourceful support of many different platforms, starting from UNIX, Windows, and then UNIX version from IBM AIX to SUN Microsystems Solaris, and also Linux Operating Systems. In 1995, when the Internet started to become an important connection tool in communication, the development of computer programming, User Interface Design, databases access and everything that has to do with Information Technology, INIXINDO also has developed their technical resources in the entire field mentioned earlier.
